column4: guys i really need some help with ubuntu i`m using a automatic DHCP and i cant seem to make ubuntu to work on this connection
how can anyone help you with the information given?

my connection is a Automatic DHCP and on windows it seems to work fine when i boot on ubuntu and make the setting for the connection it doesnt work, i`ve set the setthing to automatic DHCP i`ve added the dns server rebooted the network and cant see to make it work
